nodes.text: Pacara was a terrestrial planet located in the galaxy's Mid Rim. By the time of the mission to Batuu during the First Order/Resistance War, Pacara housed a secret base for the Resistance.

Pacara was first mentioned in Star Wars: Rise of the Resistance, an attraction for the Star Wars: Galaxy's Edge land at Disneyland and Disney's Hollywood Studios. The Lucasfilm Story Group's Matt Martin later confirmed the spelling of the name via Twitter.
